TopicTitle: Crash after returning to Space Center

Articles.Content:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Played a mission, splashed down

2. Returned to Space Center

3. Went to VAB

4. Crash to desktop

Can reproduce every time I play for a while. Switching scenes beachballs then crashes. Don't remember that happening on 0.25, but I had different/more mods installed.

Mods:
